amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for a policy change by the Department of Labor Office of Federal Contract Compliance Program which would treat health care providers as Federal contractors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to promulgate Directive 293, issued December 16, 2010, by the Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Walberg.
